text.0: give us the rapture that is mightiest indra prompt to bestow and swift to aid o hero.
text.1: that wins with brave steeds where brave steeds encounter and quells the vṛtras and the foes in battle.
text.2: for with loud voice the tribes invoke thee indra to aid them in the battlefield of heroes.
text.3: thou with the singers hast pierced through the paṇis the charger whom thou aidest wins the booty.
text.4: both races indra of opposing foemen o hero both the Ārya and the dāsa.
text.5: hast thou struck down like woods with wellshot lightnings thou rentest them in fight most manly chieftain.
text.6: indra befriend us with no scanty succour prosper and aid us loved of all that liveth.
text.7: when fighting for the sunlight we invoke thee o hero in the fray in wars division.
text.8: be ours o indra now and for the future be graciously inclined and near to help us.
text.9: thus may we singing sheltered by the mighty win many cattle on the day of trial.
